Title: Requires the department of transportation to determine which entrances to parkways in the state are most frequently accessed by oversized commercial vehicles and to prevent such access
Summary: Requires the department of transportation to determine which entrances to parkways in the state are most frequently accessed by oversized commercial vehicles and to install certain barriers to prevent such vehicles from accessing such entrances.
ActClause: AN ACT to require the department of transportation to determine which entrances to parkways in the state are most frequently accessed by oversized commercial vehicles and to install certain barriers to prevent such vehicles from accessing such entrances
